verses.verse: Pursue <S%G1377><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> <S%G2206><s%> And Be Emulous <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Spirituals, <S%G4152><s%> <S%G3123><s%> But Rather <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Prophecy. <S%G4395><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For He That <S%G1063><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> With A Tongue, <S%G1100><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> To Men <S%G444><s%> Speaks, <S%G2980><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God : <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3762><s%> For No One <S%G1063><s%> Hears; <S%G191><s%> In Spirit <S%G4151><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> He Speaks <S%G2980><s%> Mysteries. <S%G3466><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Prophecies, <S%G4395><s%> To Men <S%G444><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> For Building Up <S%G3619><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Consolation. <S%G3889><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> With A Tongue, <S%G1100><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Builds Up; <S%G3618><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Prophesies, <S%G4395><s%> The Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Builds Up. <S%G3618><s%>

<S%G2309><s%> Now I Desire <S%G1161><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> With Tongues, <S%G1100><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye Should Prophecy : <S%G4395><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> For Is <S%G1063><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Prophesies <S%G4395><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> <S%G1100><s%> With Tongues, <S%G1622><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> He Should Interpret, <S%G1329><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Building Up <S%G3619><s%> May Receive. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G3570><s%> And Now, <S%G1161><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> With Tongues <S%G1100><s%> Speaking, <S%G2980><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Shall I Profit, <S%G5623><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> I Shall Speak <S%G2980><s%> Either <S%G2228><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Revelation, <S%G602><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Teaching? <S%G1322><s%>

Even <S%G3676><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lifeless Things <S%G895><s%> A Sound <S%G5456><s%> Giving, <S%G1325><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> Pipe <S%G836><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> Harp, <S%G2788><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Distinction <S%G1293><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Sounds <S%G5353><s%> <S%G3361><s%> They Give Not, <S%G1325><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Shall Be Known <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Being Piped <S%G832><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Being Harped? <S%G2789><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> An Un Certain <S%G82><s%> Sound <S%G5456><s%> A Trumpet <S%G4536><s%> Give, <S%G1325><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Shall Prepare Himself <S%G3903><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> War? <S%G4171><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> By Means Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tongue <S%G1100><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> An Intelligible <S%G2154><s%> Speech <S%G3056><s%> Ye Give, <S%G1325><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Shall Be Known <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Being Spoken? <S%G2980><s%> <S%G2071><s%> For Ye Will Be <S%G1063><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Air <S%G109><s%> Speaking. <S%G2980><s%>

<S%G5118><s%> So Many, <S%G1487><s%> It May Be, <S%G5177><s%> Kinds <S%G1085><s%> Of Sounds <S%G5456><s%> There Are <S%G2076><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> None <S%G3762><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Without Distinct Sound. <S%G880><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I Know Not <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sound, <S%G5456><s%> I Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To Him That <S%G3588><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> A Barbarian; <S%G915><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Speaks, <S%G2980><s%> For <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> A Barbarian. <S%G915><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> Since <S%G1893><s%> Emulous <S%G2207><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> Of Spirits, <S%G4151><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Building Up <S%G3619><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Seek <S%G2212><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Abound. <S%G4052><s%>
Wherefore <S%G1355><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> With A Tongue, <S%G1100><s%> Let Him Pray <S%G4336><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He May Interpret. <S%G1329><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> I Pray <S%G4336><s%> With A Tongue, <S%G1100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> My Spirit <S%G3450><s%> Prays, <S%G4336><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3563><s%> But My Understanding <S%G3450><s%> Unfruitful <S%G175><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Is It? <S%G2076><s%> I Will Pray <S%G4336><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> I Will Pray <S%G4336><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Understanding. <S%G3563><s%> I Will Praise <S%G5567><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> I Will Praise <S%G5567><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Understanding. <S%G3563><s%>

Else <S%G1893><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Thou Bless <S%G2127><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Fills <S%G378><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Uninstructed <S%G2399><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Shall He Say <S%G2046><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Amen <S%G281><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4674><s%> Thy Giving Of Thanks, <S%G2169><s%> Since <S%G1894><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Thou Sayest <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Knows Not? <S%G1492><s%>

<S%G4771><s%> <S%G3303><s%> For Thou Indeed <S%G1063><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Givest Thanks, <S%G2168><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Built Up. <S%G3618><s%>
I Thank <S%G2168><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, My, <S%G3450><s%> Than All <S%G3956><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> With Tongues <S%G1100><s%> Speaking; <S%G2980><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> I Desire <S%G2309><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> With <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Understanding <S%G3563><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> To Speak, <S%G2980><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> I May Instruct, <S%G2727><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> Ten Thousand <S%G3463><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Tongue. <S%G1100><s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Children <S%G3813><s%> Be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Your Minds, <S%G5424><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Malice <S%G2549><s%> Be Babes; <S%G3515><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But In <S%G1161><s%> Your Minds <S%G5424><s%> Full Grown <S%G5046><s%> Be. <S%G1096><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> <S%G1125><s%> It Has Been Written, <S%G3754><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Other Tongues, <S%G2084><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Lips <S%G5491><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> I Will Speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> To This People, <S%G5129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Will They Hear <S%G1522><s%> Me, <S%G3450><s%> Saith The <S%G3004><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tongues <S%G1100><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> Are, <S%G1526><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> To Those That <S%G3588><s%> Believe, <S%G4100><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Unbelievers; <S%G571><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Unbelievers, <S%G571><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To Those That <S%G3588><s%> Believe. <S%G4100><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Come Together <S%G4905><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In One Place, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> With Tongues <S%G1100><s%> Should Speak, <S%G2980><s%> <S%G1525><s%> And Come In <S%G1161><s%> Uninstructed Ones <S%G2399><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Unbelievers, <S%G571><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Will They Not Say <S%G2046><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Are Mad? <S%G3105><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Prophesy, <S%G4395><s%> <S%G1525><s%> And Should Come <S%G1161><s%> In Some <S%G5100><s%> Unbeliever <S%G571><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Uninstructed, <S%G2399><s%> He Is Convicted <S%G1651><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> He Is Examined <S%G350><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> All; <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Secrets <S%G2927><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Of His Heart <S%G846><s%> Manifest <S%G5318><s%> Become; <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thus, <S%G3779><s%> Falling <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> His Face, <S%G4383><s%> He Will Do Homage <S%G4352><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> Declaring <S%G518><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Indeed <S%G3689><s%> Amongst <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Is It, <S%G2076><s%> Brethren? <S%G80><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Ye May Come Together, <S%G4905><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> A Psalm <S%G5568><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> A Teaching <S%G1322><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> A Tongue <S%G1100><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> A Revelation <S%G602><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> An Interpretation <S%G2058><s%> Has. <S%G2192><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Building Up <S%G3619><s%> Let Be Done. <S%G1096><s%>

If <S%G1535><s%> With A Tongue <S%G1100><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Speak, Let It Be <S%G2980><s%> By <S%G2596><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Most <S%G4118><s%> Three, <S%G5140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G303><s%> In Succession, <S%G3313><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Let Interpret; <S%G1329><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> And If <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3361><s%> There Be Not <S%G5600><s%> An Interpreter, <S%G1328><s%> Let Him Be Silent <S%G4601><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> An Assembly; <S%G1577><s%> <S%G1438><s%> And To Himself <S%G1161><s%> Let Him Speak <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G4396><s%> And Prophets <S%G1161><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Let Speak, <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> Let Discern. <S%G1252><s%>
<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> To Another <S%G243><s%> Should Be A Revelation <S%G601><s%> Sitting By, <S%G2521><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Let Be Silent. <S%G4601><s%>

Ye Can <S%G1410><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> ' <S%G2596><s%> One By One <S%G1520><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Prophesy, <S%G4395><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> May Learn, <S%G3129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> May Be Exhorted. <S%G3870><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Of Prophets <S%G4396><s%> To Prophets <S%G4396><s%> Are Subject. <S%G5293><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> Of Disorder <S%G181><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Of Peace, <S%G1515><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints. <S%G40><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> Let Them Be Silent, <S%G4601><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For It Is Not Allowed <S%G2010><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> To Speak; <S%G2980><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%>, To Be In Subjection, <S%G5293><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Says. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> To Learn <S%G3129><s%> They Wish, <S%G2309><s%> <S%G1722><s%> At Home <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G2398><s%> Husbands <S%G435><s%> Let Them Ask; <S%G1905><s%> <S%G150><s%> For A Shame <S%G1063><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> For Women <S%G1135><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> To Speak. <S%G2980><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Went Out, <S%G1831><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Only <S%G3441><s%> Did It Arrive? <S%G2658><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Thinks <S%G1380><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Spiritual, <S%G4152><s%> Let Him Recognize <S%G1921><s%> The Things <S%G3739><s%> I Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> They Are <S%G1526><s%> Commands. <S%G1785><s%>
<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Be Ignorant, <S%G50><s%> Let Him Be Ignorant. <S%G50><s%>

So That, <S%G5620><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Be Emulous <S%G2206><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Prophesy, <S%G4395><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> With Tongues <S%G1100><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Do Not Forbid. <S%G2967><s%>
All Things <S%G3956><s%> Becomingly <S%G2156><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G2596><s%> Order <S%G5010><s%> Let Be Done. <S%G1096><s%>
